Next Generation Vb Info

21 Feb 2000

Microsoft has released some details about the next generation 'Programmable Web Language Innovations' - basically the set of new features that they'll be adding to future releases of VB.\n

\n

\nWith features like inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism, its obvious they want to move in an object orientated direction. To me, it sounds a lot like their next new answer to counter the growing popularity of Java.\n
